name: 阿耶波多
bio_short: 古印度数学家和天文学家，印度数学黄金时代的奠基人。他以其著作《阿里亚哈塔历书》而闻名，书中系统性地使用了十进制，发明了正弦表（三角学），并精确计算了π的值。
bio_short_en: An ancient Indian mathematician and astronomer, a foundational figure of the golden age of Indian mathematics. He is renowned for his work 'Aryabhatiya', which systemized the decimal system, invented sine tables (trigonometry), and gave a precise value for Pi.
